name: Dash On
description: 💫ABOUT 💫 "Dash On" is a casual/arcade game where the player will have to keep dashing to survive and collect Cores(in-game currency). The longer the player survives the higher the score. He can use his coins to upgrade his character and purchase power ups. 💫FEW WORDS FROM DEVLOPER💫 I hope you enjoy this game. Its my first effort in making a 2d mobile game  and hope you enjoy this game and" if u find any bugs or have suggestion feel free to drop a comment". Have Fun!!😄😄
